content: hi all -- I realize I may not have explicitly noted to folks outside my employer: my (long-expected and eagerly awaited!) parental leave came 11 days early on Saturday. As such I won't be attending CL meetings or reviewing code or regularly reading messages for 3 months, until Feb 12. I think I clicked the right buttons to at least take myself out of review rotation. For regalloc2 stuff, Trevor can cover as needed I think; for general CL stuff, anyone else here. See y'all next year!
